body:
Zeekrewards.com & Zeekler has changed thousands of lives financially. 

The SEC & AG Office in North Carolina allegedly claims that Zeekler/Zeek Rewards is a ponzi scheme.

In no way that this company defrauded anyone. We believe that Zeekler/Zeek Rewards has given us the leadership and the freedom to support our families.

Thousands and maybe millions of people are suffering by this and we are taken a stand of what's right.

Paul Burks, the CEO of Rex Venture Group wanted was a system that the average person can do.

For it to be taken away from us is devastating. So we are behind Paul Burks, Rex Venture Group, Zeekler/Zeek Rewards and it's affiliates 100%!!  We don't want to be silent to these allegations that the SEC & AG office is making.

So with that, we are taking a STAND!
title:
Support Keeping Zeek Rewards Open: Stop The SEC And Attorney  
General From Stealing Our Business.
